story.text: SAN FRANCISCO Jan 3 Redhook Ale Brewery Inc. HOOK.O said on Wednesday it was in talks with rival beer maker Widmer Brothers Brewing Company over the possibility of combining the two companies. Redhook said the discussions were in the very early stages and would likely take several weeks. Redhook and Widmer currently share a joint sales and marketing venture in the western United States and a brewing and licensing relationship on the East Coast.
story.title: brewers redhook , widmer in talks to combine
